thread.title: Reid says he will weigh in with Iran on the conviction of Post reporter Jason Rezaian
thread.title_full: Reid says he will weigh in with Iran on the conviction of Post reporter Jason Rezaian - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Reid says he will weigh in with Iran on the conviction of Post reporter Jason Rezaian
text: LAS VEGAS -- Senate Minority Leader Harry M. Reid (D-Nev.) said Monday that he plans to write a letter to the president of Iran seeking an appeal of the conviction on espionage charges of Washington Post correspondent Jason Rezaian. “I would hope with all the work that’s been done between the two countries the last […] ...
